attributes.title: Interior Designer
attributes.description:
## About Us

Remote Employees has been successfully cooperating with clients from Europe and the USA for over 2.5 years. We specialize in providing talented professionals for international projects. We welcome both experienced designers and beginnersâ€”we provide training, internships, and full support, so even without prior experience, you can start your career with us.

## Who We Are Looking For

We are looking for a motivated Interior Designer or Assistant Interior Designer to join our remote team. If you love decorating interiors, have an eye for aesthetics, or want to start your career in interior design, this is your opportunity.

## Key Responsibilities

* Develop interior design concepts for foreign clients
* Work with design software such as Photoshop, CorelDraw, 3Ds Max, Adobe Illustrator, ArchiCAD, AutoCAD, VRay
* Collaborate with clients to understand their needs and preferences
* Assist in preparing design presentations and project documentation
* Contribute to developing creative design elements and solutions

## Requirements

* Experience in design software is a plus, but not required for beginners
* Interest in interior design and eagerness to learn
* Creativity, attention to detail, and a passion for aesthetics
* Good communication skills and openness to client feedback
* Knowledge of ergonomics and finishing materials is a plus
* Portfolio is appreciated but not mandatory for beginners

## Tools You Will Work With

* Photoshop, CorelDraw, 3Ds Max
* Adobe Illustrator, ArchiCAD, AutoCAD
* VRay and other design tools

## Why Join Us

* Remote work with international clients
* Full support and training for beginners
* Opportunity to develop your portfolio and skills
* Friendly team and mentorship
* Chance to grow professionally in the interior design field

## How to Apply

Leave your contact details on our website or record a short video interview. We will get in touch with you soon!

**Note:** No experience? No problem! We welcome beginners and offer internships and training for those starting their career in interior design.
